header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Landmarks along the Thames, O2 Arena, not owning a car, going on holiday with family, American cup measurements, philosophical questions.
header.activity: Chatting whilst walking along the Thames from Woolwich towards Greenwich.
